function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Proliferation of digitally connected iot devices in smart cities can lead to an increased risk of contagious diseases spreading through these devices.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of technological infrastructure for internet connectivity","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased population density in urban areas","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relocalised centres and decentralized work environments may lead to increased population density in these areas, posing a risk of contagion and rapid disease spread.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on iot platforms and smart devices for data connectivity creates a potential security risk, as these systems are vulnerable to cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized framework for iot device implementation","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unavailability of supportive technological infrastructure, including network connectivity","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited wireless communication leading to expensive infrastructural costs","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited network and database setups for smart cities","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on quality network for smart city sustainability","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Introduction of 6g technology","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of wireless technology installation and application due to covid-19","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of 5g and potential future transition to 6g increasing connectivity and data transfer speeds.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to internet and digital solutions in least developed countries ldcs","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Obsolete hardware and software in the past may have lacked proper infection control measures","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity to fragile or toxic ores and chemicals can pose health risks in the absence of proper monitoring and control","category":"Soil","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased urban density and the use of digital replicas in smart cities may impact public health and safety","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of accurate data on urban forest composition and health","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid adoption of 5g model without thorough impact assessment","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate technological infrastructure for 6g and smart cities","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Remodelling and re-engineering of networks and systems across cities","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Creation of new types of devices leading to obsolescence of existing ones","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving supportive infrastructures for 6g technology","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cost implications and extensive upgrades for existing networks","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of different computing technologies in future cities","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitation of infrastructural capacity for 6g wireless technology due to different antenna and transceiver designs","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased network security challenges with the expansion of 6g technology and connectivity scope","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Compatibility issues with 6g devices and sensors","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unprecedented energy consumption and high cost of energy-efficient devices","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cost of implementing 6g technology","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in 5g deployment","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks associated with 6g wireless technology","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Substantial limitations in technological infrastructure development for 6g implementation","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development and application of 6g technology without considering health implications","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of sustainability in the design and manufacturing of iot devices","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"5g-enabled ultrasound may lead to misdiagnosis and inappropriate treatment of patients.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid deployment of 5g infrastructure without proper guidelines and monitoring may contribute to electromagnetic field exposure and public health concerns.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious diseases transmission within the built environment due to increased use of iot and interconnected devices.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources, especially doctors and nurses, leading to lack of timely diagnosis and treatment for covid-19 infectors.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of medical images and test reports through 5g network.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on 5g network for data collection and transmission","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and data security concerns with smart monitors at home doors","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of unmanned aerial vehicles uav and robots for surveillance and enforcement of lockdown policies may lead to privacy concerns and violations.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large-scale data transmission and analysis through the 5g network may pose cybersecurity risks and vulnerabilities.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources due to pandemic and logistics challenges","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in meeting basic living needs due to lockdown policies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of work and production due to pandemic and lockdown policies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of 5g-based thermal imaging for human body temperature measurement may result in privacy concerns and data security risks.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of 5g-based driverless vehicles and unmanned distribution robots for delivery may lead to increased potential for disease transmission.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid adoption of 5g-based technologies may lead to increased reliance on efficient but vulnerable digital infrastructure, posing a risk of cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"}]}
